title: Apple unveils Vision Pro, its $3,499 augmented-reality headset
description: Apple’s first major new product in nearly a decade has impressive technology, but what will you use it for?

title: Electric vehicles are taking off in parts of conservative Texas
description: Electric vehicles are often associated with liberal coastal types who speak of saving the planet. But in this Republican stronghold north of Dallas, more and more drivers are deciding EVs are just common sense.

title: ChatGPT has a problem no one wants to talk about
description: The sheer expense of operating AI chatbots, which lose money every time you use them, could throttle the AI boom.

title: What to expect at Apple’s WWDC, from iOS updates to a headset and MacBooks
description: Apple may gamble on the future of computing at its annual software showcase, WWDC.

title: Apple’s new headset isn’t the first. Check out what came before it.
description: The VR headsets and other eyewear that came before the expected announcement of the Reality Pro at the Apple Worldwide Developers Conference.
